title: GameUP
small_description: A Cross Platform Mobile App built for Athletes and Institutes to compete and rank in various sports across their districts, states and countries.
big_description: GameUP is a cross platform mobile application built in React Native for both IOS and Android. The app allows for sports players to sign up and compete with other users on the app and includes an intuitive ranking system. This application uses numerous production standards and implements technologies such as Push Notifications, Real Time Chat using Websockets, state handling using Mobx State Tree, Android Native API's such as the Credential Manager etc.

title: IgCops || Unfollower Tracker
small_description: An Android App that unlocks a deep dive into your Instagram account analytics
big_description: IgCops is the perfect app for anyone looking to keep tabs on their Instagram account. With its advanced algorithms and numerous fail-safes, IgCops is the safest and most reliable way to track your Instagram account's stats. IgCops offers a variety of features that make it easy to keep track of your followers, unfollowers, and more. With IgCops, you can see who has recently followed or unfollowed you, as well as check your followers, following, mutual, not following you back, and the accounts that you are not following back all in one place. This application was built on a robust api reverse engineering system to work along with technologies such as Android Widgets and Background services

title: PicDF
small_description: An all-in-one PDF app with 8 tools
big_description: PicDF allows you to create, compress, merge, split, rotate, bookmark, encrypt, decrypt PDF's and many more. PicDF offers a powerful suite of tools for PDF manipulation while still remaining easy to use and understand. PicDF was a experimental application due to it being built entirely in Python using the Kivy framework. It was constructed to test the limits of what python could do in terms of mobile development and to see if it was possible to build a production ready application using python.

title: Catapult React Native Boilerplate
small_description: A batteries-included React Native boilerplate inspired by Ignite.
big_description: Catapult is a highly opinionated React Native boilerplate with batteries included, based on the widely used and battle-tested Ignite Boilerplate. Developed by Oxlac Tech LLP, it's designed to streamline the creation of mobile applications by incorporating essential features and packages out-of-the-box. Enhancements include nativewind for styling, advanced modals and bottom sheet components, persistent and non-persistent root stores via MobX state trees, a generic API model with built-in error handling and authorization, custom in-app alerts, modern haptic feedback for both Android and iOS, secure storage solutions, and Firebase Analytics and Remote Config integration. Additionally, it provides user alerts for internet connectivity changes and is compatible with both `expo prebuild` and `expo go` workflows.

title: Reminder App
small_description: An android app for creating reminders made using the kivy and kivyMD framework for python.
big_description: This reminder app organizes your reminders into lists. You can create multiple lists that contains reminders inside them. Each reminder can be set to notify you through notifications on a particular day or date at a specific time. This app was built using the Kivy and KivyMD framework for python and was the first movile application I attempted to build

title: NeuKivy
small_description: A collection of Neumorphic widgets made with kivy
big_description: Neukivy is a collection of neumorphic widgets built with Kivy.

title: KivAds
small_description: Implement Admob Support Directly into your kivy programs
big_description: A comprehensive guide into creating notification on android using python

title: Android Notifications in Python Guide
small_description: A comprehensive guide into creating notification on android using python
big_description: A python SDK built to wrap the Google Admob API in order to implement Google Admob ads into a Kivy Application. This library was constructed after I found that there was no easy way to implement Admob ads into a Kivy application.

title: Sticky Notes Program
small_description: A simple sticky notes program made using the kivy framework for python
big_description: A simple sticky notes program made in Kivy and KivyMD for demonstrating how easy it is to create a good looking desktop application with these frameworks. The application uses a MySQl database for storing the data. It also boasts support for multiple uses with sign in and sign up functionality. Sticky notes can be grouped, searched and colored individually.

title: Zeon Know Your Customer
small_description: A custom KYC system built for use in rural areas of India
big_description: Zeon KYC is a custom Know Your Customer system built for user in rural places in India. The frontend and backend where constructed as part of a 24 hour hackathon with a team of four memebers. The front-end was constructed using pure HTML and Javascript whereas the backend was constructed using a python flask server. The system allowed for users to simply display their government issues Id Card and Zeon would identify the type of card, extract the information entered and attempt to verify its authenticity using free online government tools. Any captchas that where required where presented to the user for an extra level of security. Facial matching was also present to match live images with the images on the ID card.

title: EdArchives
small_description: A platform for users to share and view educational resources for any topic under the sun
big_description: EdArchives was a concept app built for a 12 hour hackathon. The inspiration for the project idea was from Reddit. Reddit is a go to place for getting infomration on almost anything, however it requires careful analyiss as the quality of information as well as the authenticity cannot be verified. EdArchives proposes a system similar to wikipedia but in a reddit style format. The app was built in Kotlin and used Firebase Authentication. The backend was built in Django.

title: ClayFactory Game
small_description: A pattern matching game with Kivy for Python with a rule based AI
big_description: A pattern matching game made in python. The goal of the game was to use various glay colors and clay sizes to recreate a randomly  generated pattern on the screen. There where 20 levels for each difficulty that was pre generated, and also an infinite level generation mode. Each of the levels used a rule based AI in order to generate the levels and also an image matching AI in order to determine if a player had properly recreated an image.

title: Mr.DM
small_description: A quick and easy tool for automating your Instagram DMs.
big_description: MR.DM is a tool for automating your Instagram DMs. Sending marketing messages about your newly launched products to your followers is a tiring process to accomplish manually. MR.DM can solve all of that in just 3 simple steps. Mr.DM uses selenium to automate the process of sending messages to your followers. It also uses a simple GUI to make the process of sending messages even easier.

title: TheSolaAI
small_description: AI Voice Assistant for Solana Blockchain
big_description: Sola AI is a personalized AI voice assistant that seamlessly integrates Solana blockchain technology with AI, offering a hands-free user experience. It enables smooth interaction between users, OpenAI, and blockchain data through both voice and text. The application utilizes WebRTC for real-time voice and text communication, features a modern frontend built with Vite React and styled with Tailwind CSS, and employs a scalable microservices architecture for efficient data processing. It also includes blockchain data filtering, allowing microservices to process and refine blockchain data based on user queries, and supports Solana on-chain interactions such as transfers and swaps.
